Choose.name: Speed
Choose.description: Arab is able to serve up to 15000+ Transactions Per Second Arab processes thousands of transactions per second and extends to do even more.

Choose.name: flexible and easy-to-use free modules
Choose.description: There are two cost models available, with the opportunity for projects to fund user Fees.

Choose.name: Energy Efficient
Choose.description: Arab Network (DPoS) consensus model is a game-changer, unlike other blockchains, it uses very low power usage while giving high speed on a stable base.

Choose.name: Human-Friendly Names
Choose.description: Unique human-readable names easy to remember.

Choose.name: unknown

Choose.name: Technology
Choose.description: Arab is planning to be one of the first blockchains compatible with both eosio c++ smart contracts and solidity-based Ethereum Virtual Machine smart contracts in the near future. This will expose Arab to today's largest developer community.
